commits.author: Yuki Izumi
commits.body:
It was added to all three of markup.{inserted,changed,deleted}.diff,
which can cause unexpected highlighting if separate rules for the
punctuation.definition are added.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Originally part of the Subversion these have been re-scoped to function on any file. The scope will allow these commands to work on any file but be overridden by any other item with the same shortcut. However on currently SCM conflicted files the commands will take precedence.
